name: All-in-One Solitaire 2 HD
description:
All-in-One Solitaire 2 is a sequel to most popular solitaire game with 20+ new games, lots of new features, nice graphics and pleasant music.

All-in-One Solitaire 2 comes with the following games:
Beehive Solitaire
40 Thieves Solitaire (also know as Napoleon at Saint Helena, Roosevelt at San Juan, Big Forty and Le Cadran)
52 Pickup Solitaire
Algerian Solitaire
Thieves Of Egypt Solitaire
Wasp Solitaire (One Suit Wasp, To Suit Wasp and Four Suit Wasp)
Calculation Solitaire
Canfield Solitaire
Alternations Solitaire
Yukon Solitaire (Alaska Solitaire)
Tower of Hanoy Solitaire
4 Corners Solitaire
Kings in the Corners Solitaire
Aunt Mary Solitaire
Fifteens Solitaire
Goldfield Solitaire
Chameleon Solitaire
Flower Garden Solitaire
Clock Solitaire
Crazy Quilt Solitaire.
